casebody.data:
COLUMBUS BITUMINOUS CONCRETE CORP.
v.
HARRISON TWP. BD. OF ZONING APPEALS 2018-1008 Supreme Court of Ohio. October 10, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

O'Connor, C.J., and O'Donnell, J., dissent.

APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

Appeal accepted on proposition of law No. I.

Kennedy and Fischer, JJ., would accept the appeal on all propositions of law.
